channel.title: ABC169 on Memo Tut

item.title: Atcoder ABC169 A-E in Python
item.description: The worst performance ever :( #A: Multiplication 1 Just do it. a,b=map(int,input().split()) print(a*b) #B: Multiplication 2 Although it is $N<10^5$, it becomes TLE when turning normally. However, when I tried to get out of the loop, I passed. ~~ It may take some time to calculate when it overflows (it’s WA when it overflows in the first place). ~~ n=int(input()) a=list(map(int,input().split())) ans=1 if 0 in a: print(0) exit() for i in a: ans*=i if ans>10**18: print(-1) exit() print(ans) #C: Multiplication 3 Commentary AC.
